Simple Buffer





Might Lv 3
Increases P. Atk. by 15%
Shield Lv 3
Increases P. Def. by 15%
Magic Barrier Lv 2
Increases M. Def. by 30%
Empower Lv 3
Increases M. Atk. by 75%
Wind Walk Lv 2
Increases movement speed by 20
Haste Lv 2
Increases Atk. Spd. by 33%
Focus Lv 3
Increases critical rate by 30%
Death Whisper Lv 3
Increases critical power by 35%
Bless the Body Lv 6
Increases Max HP by 35%
Bless the Soul Lv 6
Increases Max MP by 35%
Bless Shield Lv 3
Increases shield def. rate by 15%
Advance Block Lv 3
Increases shield defence by 50%
Vampiric Rage Lv 4
Drain 9% enemy HP by hit
Agility Lv 3
Increases evasion by 4
Guidance Lv 3
Increases accuracy by 4
